title: President, Governor Sindh discuss development project in province
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 27 (APP): President Dr Arif Alvi and Governor Sindh Muhammad Kamran Khan Tessori on Friday met here and discussed matters of mutual interest.
The meeting held at the Aiwan-e-Sadr discussed the progress of development projects in Sindh.
Overall political situation in the country also came under discussion.
